Package com.mapdigit.gis

The gis package defines some common map objects.

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    RoadType
    define road type, current only normal and highway are defined.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    DigitalMap
    DigitalMap is the base class for VectorMap and RasterMap.
    MapBrush
    Map brush used to paint a map region object.
    MapCollection
    Class MapCollection stands for a collection of map objects.
    MapDirection
    This class is used to store driving directions results
    MapDirectionCommandElement
    Driving diretion command element.A direction for a MapStep consists at most 5 direction command elements and has following syntax [Command]-[Adj]-[Road Name]-[Adj]-[Road Name].
    MapDirectionCommandType
    Driving diretion types.
    MapLayer
    MapLayer defines a map layer.Computer maps are organized into layers.
    MapLayerContainer
    MapLayerContainer is a collection of map layers.
    MapMultiPline
    Class MapMultiPline stands for map plines¡¯ collection.
    MapMultiPoint
    Class MapMultiPoint stands for a map points collection.
    MapMultiRegion
    Class MapMultiRegion stands for map regions' collection.
    MapNoneObject
    Class MapNoneObject stands for a map object without geo info.
    MapObject
    Base class of all map objects.
    MapPen
    Map pen set the pen properties to draw a map object.
    MapPline
    Class MapPline stands for a map pline object.
    MapPoint
    Class MapPoint stands for a point map oject.
    MapRegion
    Class MapRegion stands for a map region object.
    MapRoute
    Objects of this class store information about a single route in a directions result.
    MapStep
    Objects of this class store information about a single step within a route in a directions result.
    MapSymbol
    Map symbol used to display a point.
    MapText
    Class MapText stands for a text map object.

Package com.mapdigit.gis Description

The gis package defines some common map objects.
